about_the_game:
Astraia is an innovative game that combines equipment building, dungeon challenges, platform jumping, and LAN team online. In the world of Astraia, players need to use their mobility and reflexes in a variety of environments to complete missions and challenges by sprinting, jumping, and dodging enemy skills and barrage.



The game is set in a mysterious and dangerous dungeon where players are free to explore and discover hidden treasures and secret passages. Through the equipment building system, players can collect resources and materials to build powerful weapons and armor, thereby enhancing their combat ability and survival ability.



In addition, the game also supports LAN team online mode, players can form a team with friends, cooperate to fight, and jointly face powerful enemies and complex terrain. In teamwork, players can divide their labor and work together, using their respective specialties and skills to overcome various obstacles and challenges.



The platform jumping element in the game increases the interest and challenge of the game, and the player needs to control the action of the character accurately, shuttle flexibly in the complex terrain, and avoid traps and enemy attacks. The variety and depth of the game makes each game full of unknowns and surprises, allowing players to immerse themselves in Astraia's fantasy adventure.
